img_text: the prototype @Zzcollier Follow My conclusion to a paper on Melvil Dewey: While not denying the countless ways Dewey improved and professionalized the field of librarianship in the 19th century, I must say that Melvil Dewey is no "Father" of the intersectional, inclusionary, accessible, decolonial librarianship that I practice. 8:56 PM-31 Jul 2018 5 Retweets 23 Likes
